  • Method Details

    • put

      public static long put(String from, Destination destination, String filename, InputStream in, long timeFile, long timeBase) throws IOException
      This method is used by the incoming ftp/sftp server through the DataFileAccessImpl class (mkdir and getProxySocketOutput). This is were the metadata is built. This upload does not trigger an incoming history in the ecpds plugin.
      Parameters:
      from - the from
      destination - the destination
      filename - the filename
      in - the in
      timeFile - the time file
      timeBase - the time base
      Returns:
      the long
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

    • put

    • process

      public static long process(ECpdsPut req, InputStream in, boolean fakeWrite) throws IOException
      This method is called by the parser when processing the request logs. When possible the remote IP is extracted from the FROM message. If the method is a PUSH and the fake write option is set to true then the target data mover is instructed to simulate the writing on the disk, but no file is created. If the method is a PULL then the file is retrieved as normal!
      Parameters:
      req - the req
      in - the in
      fakeWrite - the fake write
      Returns:
      the long
      Throws:
      IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
